name: fantasy-map-generator
description: Azgaar's Fantasy Map Generator - Desktop & Mobile Application
author: Azgaar

scripts.prepare-android: npm run config-icon && npm run copy-www && npm run ensure-android && npx cap sync android
scripts.ensure-android: if not exist android (echo Adding Android platform... && npx cap add android) else (echo Android platform exists)
scripts.build-android: npm run prepare-android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.build-android-release: npm run prepare-android && cd android && if not exist app\debug.keystore (echo Generating debug keystore... && keytool -genkey -v -keystore app\debug.keystore -alias androiddebugkey -storepass android -keypass android -validity 10000 -keyalg RSA -dname "CN=Android Debug,O=Android,C=US") && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.copy-www: npm run create-www && npm run copy-files
scripts.create-www: if not exist www mkdir www
scripts.copy-files: copy index.html www\\\\ && copy main.js www\\\\ && copy index.css www\\\\ && copy icons.css www\\\\ && copy sw.js www\\\\ && copy versioning.js www\\\\ && copy manifest.webmanifest www\\\\ && copy mobile-compatibility-v2.js www\\\\ && copy azgaar-touch-enhancements.js www\\\\ && copy mobile-dialog-scroll-fix.js www\\\\ && copy mobile-options-fix.css www\\\\ && copy azgaar-native-dialogs.js www\\\\ && xcopy charges www\\\\charges\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy components www\\\\components\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy config www\\\\config\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy heightmaps www\\\\heightmaps\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy images www\\\\images\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy libs www\\\\libs\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy modules www\\\\modules\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy styles www\\\\styles\\\\ /E /I /Y && xcopy utils www\\\\utils\\\\ /E /I /Y
scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && if exist android rmdir /s /q android && if exist www rmdir /s /q www
scripts.test-scripts: echo Testing all build scripts... && npm run copy-www && echo WWW copy completed!
